message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  We can adjust later if needed.
Your offer was a bit too favorable towards you, Alice. How about a 60/40 split in my favor? This accounts for the decreasing value of the money as we progress.
Let's be reasonable.  Since our last offer was rejected, I propose we split the money evenly.  This is a fair compromise and avoids further devaluation.
